# MiltonJobs.com

> Free hyperlocal business directory and jobs hub for Milton, Ontario, Canada.

MiltonJobs.com is a comprehensive, free community resource that connects Milton residents with local businesses, services, restaurants, and career opportunities.

## About Milton, Ontario
Milton is a rapidly growing town in Halton Region, Ontario, Canada. Located west of Toronto along the 401 corridor, Milton has grown from a small town to a vibrant community of over 140,000 residents. It is one of Canada's fastest-growing municipalities.

## What MiltonJobs.com Offers
- **Business Directory**: Searchable directory of real Milton businesses across all categories including restaurants, retail, services, healthcare, and more.
- **Job Listings**: Career opportunities and job categories relevant to Milton's economy including warehouse/logistics, retail, healthcare, trades, and professional services.
- **Neighborhood Guides**: Information about Milton's diverse neighborhoods including Downtown Milton, Timberlea, Harrison, Scott, Willmott, and Dempsey.
- **Community Resources**: Links to town services, schools, places of worship, recreation, and community organizations.

## Key Industries in Milton
- Warehousing, logistics, and distribution (Amazon, major distribution centres along 401 corridor)
- Retail and hospitality
- Healthcare (Milton District Hospital)
- Construction and skilled trades
- Education
- Professional services

## Categories
Restaurants, Fast Food, Coffee Shops, Grocery Stores, Banks, Pharmacies, Dentists, Doctors, Auto Repair, Hair Salons, Gyms, Real Estate, Law Offices, Schools, Churches, Mosques, Temples, Hotels, Daycares, and many more.

## Location
Milton, Ontario, Canada L9T
Halton Region
Greater Toronto Area (GTA)
